item.title: 9216004446_e09c840aa8_o
item.dc:creator: TRX_admin
item.content:encoded:
Op 4 juli vond in Vlaams cultuurhuis de Brakke Grond de 'receptie van de Vlaamse gemeenschap' plaats, een jaarlijkse feestelijke receptie van de Vlaamse Gemeenschap ihkv de Vlaamse feestdag 11 juli. De Brakke Grond was omgetoverd tot een artistieke proeftuin: een aanstekelijke netwerk-setting waar zowel diplomaten als artistiekelingen elkaar binnen semi-gestructureerde context konden ontmoeten.
Zie voor meer informatie: Opdrachtgever: http://www.brakkegrond.nl/ Concept en productie: http://cornelis-serveert.nl/de-vlaamse-proeftuin/ Aangelegenheid: http://nl.wikipedia.org/wiki/Feestdag_van_Vlaanderen

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: TRX_admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][trx_gap][slider cat='homepage-slider' engine="swiper" count="5" offset="0" orderby="date" order="desc" controls="yes" pagination="yes" progressbar="yes" caption="yes" height="496" top="-111"][section content_wrap="yes" text_align="left" background_repeat="repeat" background_pos_x="left" background_pos_y="top" parallax="no"][title top='83' weight='700' bottom='1' type="2" font_size="42" transform="uppercase" style="regular" size="medium" position="left"]Hey, welcome to our awesome theme![/title][title bottom='92' type="3" font_size="24" weight="300" color="#8d97a4" style="regular" size="medium" position="left"]You can place information about what you do right here [/title][/section][section content_wrap='yes' text_align="left" background_color="#dee3eb" background_repeat="repeat" background_pos_x="left" background_pos_y="top"][title type="2" font_size="42" bottom='46' top='58' weight="100" style="regular" size="medium" position="left" color='#4e5762']About SpotLight[/title][image align='left' url="http://spotlight.themerex.net/wp-content/imports/2014/07/homepage_img_1.png" left="-5" top='10' bottom='81' right='40'][block style="overflow:hidden; width:auto;" text_align="left"][title type="3" font_size="24" weight="300" style="regular" size="medium" bottom='8' position="left"]Multifunctional Theme with Many Options[/title][vc_column_text]

Many year experience and hundreds of successful projects have made ThemeRex a professional on the web area. Within this period of time, the company has gone through a serious evolution from amateurs to leaders. We create templates for your websites that will highlight your professionalism and reputation.

[/vc_column_text][columns count='2' top='12' bottom='45'][column_item][title type="4" font_size="20" weight="300" style="iconed" icon="icon-columns" size="medium" position="left"]5 Header Layouts[/title][vc_column_text]Choose the variant that suits your business's goals, ensuring your clients will get the most out of your website.[/vc_column_text][title top='15' type="4" font_size="20" weight="300" style="iconed" icon="icon-menu" size="medium" position="left"]100% Responsive[/title][vc_column_text]The SpotLight theme is fully responsive (and retina ready too) which ensures your website to fit in any type of devices.[/vc_column_text][/column_item][column_item][title type="4" font_size="20" weight="300" style="iconed" icon="icon-globe-1" size="medium" position="left"]Clean Design[/title][vc_column_text]With today’s market, it is hard to find the right design, but SpotLight definitely has a right one to enhance your website.[/vc_column_text][title top='15' type="4" font_size="20" weight="300" style="iconed" icon="icon-star-1" size="medium" position="left"]SEO Friendly[/title][vc_column_text]Drag more traffic to your website with our SEO Friendly theme: simply bank on the SpotLight to get your work done![/vc_column_text][/column_item][/columns][/block][/section][section content_wrap="yes" text_align="left" background_repeat="repeat" background_pos_x="left" background_pos_y="top" parallax="no"][/section][section content_wrap="yes" top='47' bottom='46' text_align="left" background_repeat="repeat" background_pos_x="left" background_pos_y="top" item.title: One level
item.dc:creator: TRX_admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][trx_gap][slider cat='homepage-slider' engine="swiper" count="5" offset="0" orderby="date" order="desc" controls="yes" pagination="yes" progressbar="yes" caption="yes" height="496" top="-111"][section background_repeat="no-repeat" background_pos_x="center" background_pos_y="center" align="center" text_align="center" content_wrap='yes'][columns count="3" top='97' bottom='94'][column_item][title type="4" font_size="20" bottom="3" weight="300" align="center" style="iconed" icon="icon-chat-1" size="large" position="top" background="circle" bd_color="#4f99bc"]ThemeRex Framework[/title][vc_column_text]ThemeRex worked out an amazing user friendly combination of functionality and comfort.[/vc_column_text][/column_item][column_item][title type="4" font_size="20" bottom="3" weight="300" align="center" style="iconed" icon="icon-doc-inv" size="large" position="top" background="circle" bd_color="#4f99bc"]Well Documented[/title][vc_column_text]All our themes come with HTML Documentation that teaches you how to install and set the theme.[/vc_column_text][/column_item][column_item][title bottom="3" type="4" font_size="20" weight="300" align="center" style="iconed" icon="icon-square19" size="large" position="top" background="circle" bd_color="#4f99bc"]Great Support[/title][vc_column_text]ThemeRex team is always there to assist users with all technical questions regarding their products.[/vc_column_text][/column_item][/columns][/section][section content_wrap='yes' text_align="left" background_color="#dee3eb" background_repeat="repeat" background_pos_x="left" background_pos_y="top"][title type="2" font_size="42" bottom='46' top='58' weight="100" style="regular" size="medium" position="left" color='#4e5762']About SpotLight[/title][image align='left' url="http://spotlight.themerex.net/wp-content/imports/2014/07/homepage_img_1.png" left="-5" top='10' bottom='81' right='40'][block style="overflow:hidden; width:auto;" text_align="left"][title type="3" font_size="24" weight="300" style="regular" size="medium" bottom='8' position="left"]Multifunctional Theme with Many Options[/title][vc_column_text]

Many year experience and hundreds of successful projects have made ThemeRex a professional on the web area. Within this period of time, the company has gone through a serious evolution from amateurs to leaders. We create templates for your websites that will highlight your professionalism and reputation.

[/vc_column_text][columns count='2' top='12' bottom='45'][column_item][title type="4" font_size="20" weight="300" style="iconed" icon="icon-columns" size="medium" position="left"]5 Header Layouts[/title][vc_column_text]Choose the variant that suits your business's goals, ensuring your clients will get the most out of your website.[/vc_column_text][title top='15' type="4" font_size="20" weight="300" style="iconed" icon="icon-menu" size="medium" position="left"]100% Responsive[/title][vc_column_text]The SpotLight theme is fully responsive (and retina ready too) which ensures your website to fit in any type of devices.[/vc_column_text][/column_item][column_item][title type="4" font_size="20" weight="300" style="iconed" icon="icon-globe-1" size="medium" position="left"]Clean Design[/title][vc_column_text]With today’s market, it is hard to find the right design, but SpotLight definitely has a right one to enhance your website.[/vc_column_text][title top='15' type="4" item.title: About TBM
item.dc:creator: TRX_admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][trex_video src="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rh0QHH8ha-w" width="734" height="445"][title type="2" style="regular" size="medium" position="left" color='#373737' top='20']Themerex Banner Manager[/title][vc_column_text]Themerex Banner Manager - Wordpress Plugin, designed to create and manage banners. With the help of Plugin Themerex Banner Manager you can:
  • Create and manage banners
  • Group banners by location or topics, advertiser
  • Easily set size parameters
  • Limit the number of displays
  • Set start and end dates
  • Use widget to display banners
  • Use shortcode to display banners
  • Insert banners into pages or posts content
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

In ID’s parameter in [ trex_banner ] shortcode you can set several comma separated ID’s i.e. [ trex_banner ids=’100, 101, 102’ ]

You can set count=’1’ in [ trex_banner ] shortcode for random banner to display.

You can put js, iframe, shortcode, text or html in content field, on banner creation page.

You can limit dates and/or number of shows for banners.

Plugin Themerex Banner Manager is translation ready, contains translation files (.po, .mo).

Plugin Themerex Banner Manager is compatible with google adsense.

You can assign an image for each banner and it will be shown on hover.

On banner page creation in “Banner <head> Code” field you can add any JS code that should be placed into <head> container.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][title type="2" style="regular" size="medium" position="left" color='#373737' top='20']How To Use Themerex Banners Widget[/title][trex_video src="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=imu4xWbP1aQ" width="734" height="445"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][title type="3" style="regular" size="medium" position="left" color='#373737' top='30']Vertical Banner[/title][trex_banner ids="1874"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][title type="3" style="regular" size="medium" position="left" color='#373737' top='40']Horizontal Banner[/title][trex_banner ids="1863"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][title type="3" style="regular" size="medium" position="left" color='#373737' top='40']Random Banner from Group[/title][trex_banner group="grouped" count='1'][vc_column_text][ trex_banner group='banner_group' ][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][title type="3" style="regular" size="medium" position="left" color='#373737' top='40']Banner With Shortcode Slider[/title][trex_banner ids="2071"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Themerex Banner Manager – WordPress Plugin, designed to create and manage banners. With the help of Plugin Themerex Banner Manager you can:

  • Easily set size parameters

Themerex Banner Manager – WordPress Plugin, designed to create and manage banners. With the help of Plugin Themerex Banner Manager you can:

  • Create and manage banners
  • Group banners by location or topics, advertiser

[/vc_column_text][divider top="39" bottom="27" type="dotted" color="#dee3eb"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][title type="2" font_size="34" weight="100" color="#373737" style="regular" size="medium" position="left"]Themerex Banner Manager[/title][trex_video src="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rh0QHH8ha-w" width="734" height="445"][title type="2" style="regular" size="medium" position="left" color='#373737' top='20']Themerex Banner Manager[/title][vc_column_text]

Themerex Banner Manager - Wordpress Plugin, designed to create and manage banners. With the help of Plugin Themerex Banner Manager you can:

  • Create and manage banners
  • Group banners by location or topics, advertiser
  • Easily set size parameters
  • Limit the number of displays
  • Set start and end dates
  • Use widget to display banners
  • Use shortcode to display banners
  • Insert banners into pages or posts content

In ID’s parameter in [trex_banner] shortcode you can set several comma separated ID’s i.e. [trex_banner ids=’100, 101, 102’]

You can set count=’1’ in [trex_banner] shortcode for random banner to display.

You can put js, iframe, shortcode, text or html in content field, on banner creation page.

You can limit dates and/or number of shows for banners.

Plugin Themerex Banner Manager is translation ready, contains translation files (.po, .mo).

Plugin Themerex Banner Manager is compatible with google adsense.

You can assign an image for each banner and it will be shown on hover.

On banner page creation in “Banner <head> Code” field you can add any JS code that should be placed into <head> container.

[/vc_column_text][title type="2" style="regular" size="medium" position="left" color='#373737' top='20']How To Use Themerex Banners Widget[/title][trex_video src="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=imu4xWbP1aQ" width="734" height="445"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
